comments:
I'm getting the library error while trying to run a simple JFace application,
and have attempted all of the fixes that I've seen documented here with
absolutely no luck.  I've also tried reversing some of the slashes in the
java.library.path spec and building/running the program in a project directory
that eliminates spaces in the command string.

Environment:  Windows XP SP2, Eclipse 3.0.2, Sun SDK 1.4.2_08

Eclipse unpacked into c:\eclipse using non-Cygnus unzip (avoids the Cygnus
"non-executable dll & exe" problem)

Program is the JFaceExample program located at
http://www.informit.com/guides/printerfriendly.asp?g=java&seqNum=92&rl=1

swt.jar, jface.jar, runtime.jar & JRE System Library defined in programs
Classpath (in Debug...)

-Djava.library.path=c:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.0.2\os\win32\x86
defined in VM arguments in Debug...

Copies of both swt-awt-win32-3064.dll & swt-win32-3064.dll placed in program
directory, \windows\system32, and in original location (java.library.path)

Command used to launch app:

 "C:\Program Files\Java\j2re1.4.2_08\bin\javaw.exe"
-Djava.library.path=c:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.0.2\os\win32\x86
-Xbootclasspath/a:C:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.0.2\ws\win32\swt.jar;C:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.core.runtime_3.0.2\runtime.jar;C:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.jface_3.0.2\jface.jar
-classpath "c:\Documents and Settings\Owner\My Documents\My Software
Projects\JFaceExample;C:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.jface_3.0.2\jface.jar;C:\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.0.2\ws\win32\swt.jar"
-Xdebug -Xnoagent -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,suspend=y,address=localhost:1204
com.snellenberger.JFaceExample

Stack trace:

java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no swt-win32-3064 in java.library.path
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(Unknown Source)
    at org.eclipse.swt.internal.Library.loadLibrary(Library.java:100)
    at org.eclipse.swt.internal.win32.OS.<clinit>(OS.java:18)
    at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.<clinit>(Widget.java:66)
    at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.createShell(Window.java:393)
    at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.create(Window.java:347)
    at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.open(Window.java:637)
    at com.snellenberger.JFaceExample.main(JFaceExample.java:38)


--

phone yesterday and thought, "they need   | GPG KeyID: 5A978843
